solution_line_template: The total cost of toilet paper is {num_toilet_paper_rolls} * ${cost_toilet_paper_per_roll} = $<<{num_toilet_paper_rolls}*{cost_toilet_paper_per_roll}={total_cost_toilet_paper}>>{total_cost_toilet_paper}
The total cost of paper towels is {num_paper_towel_rolls} * ${cost_paper_towel_per_roll} = $<<{num_paper_towel_rolls}*{cost_paper_towel_per_roll}={total_cost_paper_towels}>>{total_cost_paper_towels}

The total cost of tissues is ${total_cost_all_items} - ${total_cost_toilet_paper} - ${total_cost_paper_towels} = $<<{total_cost_all_items}-{total_cost_toilet_paper}-{total_cost_paper_towels}={total_cost_tissues}>>{total_cost_tissues}
The cost of one box of tissues is ${total_cost_tissues} / {num_tissue_boxes} = $<<{total_cost_tissues}/{num_tissue_boxes}={cost_one_box_tissues}>>{cost_one_box_tissues}.
